A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: There's so much wrong with this movie that I don't even know where to begin.  The pacing is terrible\, the character development is terrible (you could delete the entire Finn + Rose scenes and it would have no impact on the rest of the film) and for a 2.5 hour film\, it felt like a lot of nothing happened.  \n\nWorst of all\, this didn't even feel like a Star Wars movie.  I feel like the creators of this and the last one are either rehashing old material from the previous films as a throwback\, or trying to make it more PC by casting every ethnicity but typical white person as a main character so that they can appeal to everyone.  Forget about trying to please everyone or to make an action-packed film and get back to Star Wars roots.  The main films were about the characters; not the action.  Two films in\, and I still feel like Jarjar Binks had better character development than most of the cast so far.
